title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Attention Types and Short-Term Memory Span in Multimedia Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can recall core information with over 80% accuracy by utilizing focused attention design elements in multimedia learning materials
Learners improve learning efficiency by over 30% by selecting strategies tailored to their short-term memory capacity levels (high/medium/low)
Learners can apply visual/auditory information presented in under-5-minute microlearning content to workplace scenarios with over 70% accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
